name: Rog.ie Minisite
description:
So, for my remix, I wanted to really work with that old Max Fleischer/Vintage Disney look — I absolutely love those old TV title cards. Even the way that text rendered on the screen wasn't perfect. There was this bleed around the edges of the text where bits of cyan, yellow and red would leak through when trying to display white. 

I wanted to capture that here. That old, banged up, static-y, imperfect and slightly blurred sort of stuff we grew up watching. Oh, yeah, and it's also a contact card minisite.
